name: Chicken Adobo
description: On hot days, don’t sweat dinner—literally! Let the microwave do the heat-busting, heavy lifting. At the same time, our seasoning blend brings electric, Mexican adobo flavour without having to chop up anything but the chicken. All the chilies, tomatoes, and aromatic spices (over 15 of them!) are right in the blend.

ingredients.name: Chicken Barbacoa Seasoning or Pulled Pork Seasoning

preparation: Cut chicken into 1" pieces, then place in Round Steamer. Add seasoning, frozen veggies, water, olive oil, and tomato paste to steamer; stir to combine.
Cover and microwave on high 14–16 min, stirring halfway through, or until chicken is cooked through and sauce is bubbling.
tips: Make it vegan—swap cubed, firm tofu for chicken thighs.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup cooked grains such as rice, couscous, or quinoa.
